Text: Is it just me, or did almost nothing happen in this miniseries?  It was basically just a lead-in to World's Finest, amiright?
Didn't read issue six yet,but liked this series mainly because of To's beautiful artwork...probably his best to date...
Oh, it's definitely good-looking nothing, but it just seems to exist to establish her character in the new reality.  I don't know if I'd drop $20 on it knowing that.
